DLG a
Traffic is so good today I can just sit in the middle of the road!

DLG b
Don't bother me, I'm watching Everybody Hates Cars.

DLG c
I'm making (engine revving sounds) in the oven! They smell so good!

DLG d
I got kicked out of the garage so I have to crash here for a while.

DLG e
OH HELP ME! I WAS IN A HORRIBLE CASE OF HIT AND RUN!

DLG f
SOMEBODY CALL A TOWTRUCK!

DLG g
OH GOD! IT WAS AWFUL!

DLG h
It's 7:30, I should be getting home...

DLG i
When driving over grass I always try to drive carefully.
